channel.title: Templescape beta
channel.description:
[CENTER][CENTER][URL=http://s476.photobucket.com/user/ranchief2/media/logo4_zps84fe4050.png.html][IMG]http://i476.photobucket.com/albums/rr129/ranchief2/logo4_zps84fe4050.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://"http://temple-network.com/"]Website[/URL] [URL=http://"http://temple-network.com/forums/"]Community[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.multiupload.nl/1QASPR0WJE"]Download[/URL]
The server includes:
[ul][COLOR="#FF0000"] [*] Amazing skilling [*] 100% Summoning [*] Amazing eco [*] All skills are trainable. 100% [*] Proper combat system [*] Perfect switches [*] Barrows [*] Talented staff [*] 24/7 Vps [*] Pest control [*] Overload [*] Tons of bosses [*] Completely unique donor zone [*] Everything you expect from a server, We have it![/COLOR][/ul]
[URL=http://s476.photobucket.com/user/ranchief2/media/background3_zps5c97dbff.png.html][IMG]http://i476.photobucket.com/albums/rr129/ranchief2/background3_zps5c97dbff.png[/img][/URL] Hello my name is Vocab, first of all thank you for reading this post. . However, I never want to forget my journey through this game over the years. so today I’m happy to announce that Templescape is released.
- This is a BETA, the game is far from being completed. This means there are still many bugs to fix and areas to develop. You are not playing a finished product.
- Everything you see in the BETA is subject to change, addition or removal.
TempleScape will strives on Staff knowledge, common goals and organization. Our server includes talented staff who are always there to help, We will hold server event time to time for the enjoyment of our members. We will mostly be focusing on the content of the server. Our main goal on this project is to make a server with a great economy, PvM, PvP and great skilling base. I am hoping to add quests to the server and achievements. We will be making sure that the player base has plenty of fresh content to experience. The server is running on a powerful, 24/7 vps resulting in no lag and nothing but fluid gameplay. [URL=http://s476.photobucket.com/user/ranchief2/media/aboutus_zpsadc3cba2.png.html][IMG]http://i476.photobucket.com/albums/rr129/ranchief2/aboutus_zpsadc3cba2.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Templescape beta
item.dc:creator: @hypology hypology
item.description:
@hypology wrote:

[quote=“testcrasher1, post:3, topic:539189”]TONS of bosses and a very unique server over all. One of the best RSPS’s i’ve been on in awhile. I donated and definitely got what i paid for, the donor zone is completely unique and nothing like i’ve seen before.[/quote] Thank you very much, enjoy your stay in this outstanding community.

boshi:

its really an amazing server i tired it and still playing it… its have epic boss’s and coool owners and mods i hope you guys join us and try it <3

Nice, invite your friends.

Read full topic

item.title: Templescape beta
item.dc:creator: @hypology hypology
item.description:
@hypology wrote:

[CENTER][CENTER][URL=http://s476.photobucket.com/user/ranchief2/media/logo4_zps84fe4050.png.html][/URL]

[URL=http://“http://temple-network.com/”]Website[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://temple-network.com/forums/”]Community[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://www.multiupload.nl/1QASPR0WJE”]Download[/URL]

The server includes:

[ul][COLOR="#FF0000"]
[] Amazing skilling
[] 100% Summoning
[] Amazing eco
[] All skills are trainable. 100%
[] Proper combat system
[] Perfect switches
[] Barrows
[] Talented staff
[] 24/7 Vps
[] Pest control
[] Overload
[] Tons of bosses
[] Completely unique donor zone
[] Everything you expect from a server, We have it![/COLOR][/ul]

[URL=http://s476.photobucket.com/user/ranchief2/media/background3_zps5c97dbff.png.html][/URL]
Hello my name is Vocab, first of all thank you for reading this post. . However, I never want to forget my journey through this game over the years. so today I’m happy to announce that Templescape is released.

  • This is a BETA, the game is far from being completed. This means there are still many bugs
    to fix and areas to develop. You are not playing a finished product.

  • Everything you see in the BETA is subject to change, addition or removal.

TempleScape will strives on Staff knowledge, common goals and organization. Our server includes talented staff who are always there to help, We will hold server event time to time for the enjoyment of our members.
We will mostly be focusing on the content of the server. Our main goal on this project is to make a server with a great economy, PvM, PvP and great skilling base. I am hoping to add quests to the server and
achievements. We will be making sure that the player base has plenty of fresh content to experience. The server is running on a powerful, 24/7 vps resulting in no lag and nothing but fluid gameplay.
[URL=http://s476.photobucket.com/user/ranchief2/media/aboutus_zpsadc3cba2.png.html][/URL]
